mapper.insert: insert into restaurant(rt_name, rt_address, rt_phoneNum, rt_type, rt_openTime, rt_me_id) values(#{rt_name}, #{rt_address}, #{rt_phoneNum}, #{rt_type}, #{rt_openTime}, #{rt_me_id})
mapper.update: update restaurant set rt_name = #{rt_name}, rt_address = #{rt_address}, rt_phoneNum = #{rt_phoneNum}, rt_type = #{rt_type}, rt_openTime = #{rt_openTime}, rt_upDate = #{rt_upDate} where rt_num = #{rt_num}
mapper.select: select restaurant.*, im_name as rt_im_name from restaurant left join review on rt_num = re_rt_num left join image on re_num = im_where group by rt_num order by rt_score desc
mapper.update: update restaurant set rt_score = (select round(avg(re_totalSc),1) from review where re_rt_num = rt_num) where rt_num = #{re_rt_num} ;
mapper.select: select * from restaurant where rt_name like concat('%',#{cri.search},'%') or rt_address like concat('%',#{cri.search},'%')
